845639035:
[

Coach - Drama Director, Silver Creek MS

Company Name Montgomery County Public Schools Company Location Kensington, AU

New Posted Date Posted 15 hours ago

Be an early applicant

Job description

Details on the hours and compensation for this coaching position can be found in the most recent copy of the "Extracurricular Activities (ECA) Handbook" which is located on the MCPS website. http://www.montgomeryschoolsmd.org/uploadedFiles/departments/ersc/employees/timekeepers/eca_handbook_current.pdf

Additional information on extracurricular stipends can be found in the MCEA Contract under article 20. http://www.montgomeryschoolsmd.org/uploadedFiles/departments/associationrelations/teachers/MCEA_Contract.pdf

MCPS Job Description

To be an athletics coach in MCPS, an applicant must be interviewed and hired by the principal or designee at the school where the coaching vacancy exists.

Coaches must be qualified and are hired for one season.

Schools must hire qualified MCPS teachers or professional certified educators to coaching positions, if available.

Emergency coaches may be hired if no qualified MCPS teacher or professional certified educator is available.

To Be a Certified Coach, An Applicant Must
  • Be an MCPS teacher or professional certified educator employed by MCPS
  • Have completed or be enrolled in the two credit MCPS course " Care and Prevention of Athletic Injuries, Coaching Fundamentals and CPR/AED" which is offered periodically through the MCPS Athletics Unit
  • Complete/submit the on-line MCPS Application
To coach as a Level I Emergency Coach, an applicant must:
  • Be a certified teacher (though not employed by MCPS)
  • Have completed the two credit MCPS course " Care and Prevention of Athletic Injuries, Coaching Fundamentals and CPR/AED" which is offered periodically through the MCPS Athletics Unit
  • Complete/submit the on-line MCPS Application
To coach as a Level II Emergency Coach, an applicant must:
  • Be a high school graduate
  • Be at least 21 years of age
  • Have completed the two credit MCPS course " Care and Prevention of Athletic Injuries, Coaching Fundamentals and CPR/AED" which is offered periodically through the MCPS Athletics Unit
  • Complete/submit the on-line MCPS Application

Job Specific Information

A drama director to direct a fall and spring play. The fall play will occur on November 30 and December 1, 2018. The spring play will occur on May 3 and May 4, 2019. The director will conduct tryouts and rehearsals after school from 3:10 - 4:30 on Tuesdays, Wednesday, and Thursdays.

Coaches and other part-time

Kensington

About Our Company

At Probe you will have the opportunity to really make a difference. Probe Group are Australia's fastest growing and most respected privately owned customer management and business services provider. Established in 1979, and recently having acquired Salmat Contact Solutions, we now have over 3000 staff worldwide and are enjoying a period of sustained growth.

About The Role

In this role you will be working on behalf of the Federal Government Agency. This position is primarily a programme delivery administration role. We are seeking individuals who have high attention to detail and level of writing. To be successful in this role you will have strong analytical, research and comprehension skills

Key Details
  • You must be an AUSTRALIAN CITIZEN to apply
  • Multiple full time and casual roles commencing September

Culture & Benefits

  • Staff discounts on products/services such as Medibank, Fitness First, Europcar and many more!

How To Apply

Probe is an equal opportunity employer committed to creating and maintaining a diverse and inclusive workforce that reflects the communities in which we live and conduct business.

If you are interested in working for a fast paced, innovative & rewarding environment then click apply now!

Short Description

An opportunity has arisen for enthusiastic Customer Service Representatives to join the Western Bulldogs Kennel Crew.
Employer
Western Bulldogs Football Club
Work Type
Volunteer Position
Location
Melbourne, VIC, Australia

Detailed Description

An opportunity has arisen for some enthusiastic Customer Service volunteers to join the Western Bulldogs Kennel Crew.

The Western Bulldogs will be at the Royal Melbourne Show from the 22nd September - 2nd October and are looking for volunteers that will be able to engage with consumers and fans to help bring the Western Bulldogs activation at the Royal Melbourne Show to life.

This role will be a volunteer role (as part of the Kennel Crew) and will have the potential to continue into the 2019 AFLW and AFL season.

Those Selected Will Be Responsible For
  • Assisting with activations at the Royal Melbourne Show including with the photobooth, reaction wall, data collection, and football activities.
  • Providing directions and information to fans and visitors at the Royal Melbourne Show.
  • Liaise with other staff to help execute the Western Bulldogs activation at the Royal Melbourne Show.

Volunteer candidates will have a Working With Children’s Check, and ideally be completing a degree in Marketing / Business / Sports Management / Events Management (or have completed). Volunteers should also have strong communication and customer service skills and show the ability to assist effectively in an unsupervised team environment.

If you are interested in being involved in this exciting opportunity please email Applications to click apply.

Applications close at 5pm on the 11th of September.

Please note that due to the high level of interest only those short listed will be contacted.

Senior Digital Designer

Company Name Social Garden - Customer Acquisition, Experience & Retention Company Location Melbourne, AU

Posted Date Posted 3 days ago Number of views 11 views

Be an early applicant

Job description

Social Garden is one of the fastest growing agencies in the country and is a pioneer in the new and disruptive revenue performance management industry that utilises emerging automation technology and data to scale organisational EBITA and revenue. We have a vibrant office on the Yarra in Abbotsford.

We are looking for a talented designer who is passionate about design, digital and customer experience.

We would like someone with a broader range of experience, can understand the interaction design side, set the projects visual style but also support the traditional brand experience and guide other parts of the business and team members to convey the message across all platforms and also bring brand experiences to life in the digital space.

You'll be able to quickly prototype and produce tangible examples for clients from paper sketching to digital prototyping (Marvel etc).

What is needed to be successful?
  • Excellent digital design skills with the portfolio to prove it
  • Experience with Adobe, Sketch and project management software
  • Strategic mindset, with the ability to read/influence the customer's perspective
  • Curious about self learning in the areas of digital and growth marketing
  • Human / user-centric design skills
  • Not afraid to pick up a task and run with it
  • Be a team player within our design team
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Attention to detail

Preferred Not Critical
  • Understanding and experience with conversion-rate-optimisation
  • Video editing / motion graphic experience

Key Responsibilities
  • Wireframing concepts and sketches
  • Working on campaign strategy with our talented team members
  • Designing multi-variant lead capture pages for conversion
  • Designing websites (wireframe through to pixel perfect)
  • Tracking CRO experiments and making updates based on data
  • Project management of the development process
What about our team?

You'll be joining a team that is crazy smart and very talented. We challenge each other constantly to improve and ask the tough questions. We're dedicated to generating revenue for our clients and proving it (data doesn’t lie).

What about the perks?

Our offices are open, collaborative and yes, fun! To support you at work (and play) we offer some great perks: ample time off to relax and recharge, one week a year where you can work from a remote location (whether it’s NYC or Guatemala is up to you) and the option to work from home from time-to-time. We love our staff and appreciate their loyalty. We have a program to reward them with an awesome holiday each time they hit their work anniversary (it gets better every year), and we also have a quarterly bonus program where everyone in the business gets to share in the company successes.

How To Apply
  • Provide CV and summary of relevant experience
  • Tell us why you think you would be a good fit for our company
  • Tell us who your three favourite musicians are and why
